Articles.Content:
Ok you need to be able to keep the previous commentor's picture with another picture.

RULES

  1. No offensive comments or pictures.
  2. Only use pictures used before by someone else but the first 20 comments do not apply. But you can use another pic of that thing or else it gets boring.
  3. You cannot always use the same picture solution to everything eg. You cannot post clown pic 1 and later post another pic of it.
  4. The first twenty comments must not repeat the same picture.
